Text.Page:
Can you think of any reason why the argons would choose tuwangis to transform?

Neither can I. So I'd like you to knock a few unconscious and bring them back here.

Don't laughâ€”I could learn something really important!
This is plenty, thank you. Here, I'll pay you for them.
Don't kill them. They're no good to me dead. Can't eat 'em.
